name: session
description: Discover new spots and friends to practice your favorite sports.
author: Session associates <explore-outdoors@protonmail.com>

scripts.cordova:build: quasar build -m cordova -T android -- --buildConfig="../build.cordova.json" ; cd ./dist/cordova/android/bundle/release/ ; bundletool build-apks --bundle=./app-release.aab --output=session.apks --ks=../../../../../quasar-release-key.jks --ks-key-alias=quasar-release --mode=universal
scripts.capacitor:dev:android: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod quasar dev -m capacitor -T android -H
scripts.capacitor:build:android: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod quasar build -m capacitor -T android && apksigner sign --ks ./quasar-debug-key.jks ./src-capacitor/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk
scripts.capacitor:release:android: cd src-capacitor/android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd ../.. && jarsigner -verbose -keystore ./quasar-release-key.jks -signedjar session.aab src-capacitor/android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab quasar-release
scripts.capacitor:dev:ios: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod quasar dev -m capacitor -T ios
scripts.capacitor:build:ios: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod quasar build -m capacitor -T ios --ide
